import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Course } from 'src/app/Course'; import { StudentserviceService } from 'src/app/service/studentservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courselist', templateUrl: './courselist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courselist.component.css'] }) export class CourselistComponent { courses!:Course[]; constructor(private studentService: StudentserviceService, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit():void{ this.getCourseList(); } private getCourseList() { this.studentService.getCourseList() .subscribe(data => this.courses = data); } }
